title: Games of Thrones - S1E12
description: s the first episode of the series, it introduces the setting and the main characters of the show. The episode centers on the Stark family, and how its lord, Eddard 'Ned' Stark, gets involved in the court politics after the king chooses Eddard to replace his recently deceased chief administrator ('Hand of the King'). The episode received largely positive reviews, and was seen initially by 2.2 million viewers. A week before the episode first aired, HBO made the first 15 minutes available as an Internet preview.The title of the episode is the motto (referred to as 'House Words' in-universe) of House Stark, which is spoken several times in the episode and in the series.
